name: Leave The Light
description:
A short 2D game about leaving your house, and the warm light inside it, behind. Journey across a forest and encounter different rural environments. Use the terrain to hide from the ever-present shadows that hunt you. The shadows are more perceptive than you may think, be careful where and how you hide yourself.

This game was made for the 2021 utGDDC Fall Jam 2021. The theme of the jam was "Going Outside."

Music by Ben Beardall
